name: Motor Freight Carriers, Trucking: Local/Long Distance, Moving and Storage
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Local or long distance trucking services that may or may not also
provide storage services.
For household goods warehousing and storage without trucking
services, use MCC 4225.
For couriers of parcels, goods, and packages, use MCC 4215.
